languages.text: "В здравии и силах, Лорд-капитан! Осталось только найти выход — живым — из этой преисподней, вернуть вас на ваш корабль, и тогда на ваш вопрос я отвечу "великолепно"!"

traits.locale_text: "В здравии и силах, Лорд-капитан! Осталось только найти выход — живым — из этой преисподней, вернуть вас на ваш корабль, и тогда на ваш вопрос я отвечу "великолепно"!"

languages.text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"
languages.original_text: "В здравии и силах, Лорд-капитан! Осталось только найти выход — живым — из этой преисподней, вернуть вас на ваш корабль, и тогда на ваш вопрос я отвечу "великолепно"!"

traits.locale_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this hellhole — alive — return to our vessel, and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"
"I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this hellhole — alive — return to our vessel, and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"
"I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this hellhole — alive — return to our vessel, and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"
"I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

languages.text: “我已经完全恢复了，舰长大人！接下来，我们要做的就是活着离开这个鬼地方，回到我们的船上。到了那个时候，如果您再问我这个问题，我的答案会是——棒极了！”
languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

traits.locale_text: “我已经完全恢复了，舰长大人！接下来，我们要做的就是活着离开这个鬼地方，回到我们的船上。到了那个时候，如果您再问我这个问题，我的答案会是——棒极了！”

languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

languages.text: «¡Estoy sano y bien, Lord Capitán! ¡Solo queda que salgamos vivos de este lugar espantoso y volvamos a la nave... y entonces podré decirle que estoy "estupendamente"!».
languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

traits.locale_text: «¡Estoy sano y bien, Lord Capitán! ¡Solo queda que salgamos vivos de este lugar espantoso y volvamos a la nave... y entonces podré decirle que estoy "estupendamente"!».

languages.text: 「我は健常です、ロード・キャプテン！後は、この地獄から脱出し、生きて、船に戻るだけです。そして…そしてその時、ご質問に対して『素晴らしい！』とお答えするでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

traits.locale_text: 「我は健常です、ロード・キャプテン！後は、この地獄から脱出し、生きて、船に戻るだけです。そして…そしてその時、ご質問に対して『素晴らしい！』とお答えするでしょう！」

languages.text: "Ich bin gesund und munter, Lord Captain! Uns bleibt nur noch eines ... aus dieser Hölle zu entkommen, lebendig, und zu unserem Schiff zurückzukehren. Dann lautet meine Antwort auf Eure Frage: 'Großartig!'"
languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin gesund und munter, Lord Captain! Uns bleibt nur noch eines ... aus dieser Hölle zu entkommen, lebendig, und zu unserem Schiff zurückzukehren. Dann lautet meine Antwort auf Eure Frage: 'Großartig!'"

languages.text: « Je me porte bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Mais je me sentirai encore mieux lorsque nous aurons réussi à quitter ce lieu maudit et à retourner à bord de notre vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

traits.locale_text: « Je me porte bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Mais je me sentirai encore mieux lorsque nous aurons réussi à quitter ce lieu maudit et à retourner à bord de notre vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Sağlığım yerinde çok şükür Lord Kaptan! Bir de bu iğrenç yerden sağ salim çıkıp gemimize dönebilirsek sorunuza vereceğim cevap, 'Fevkalade!' olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "I am fit and well, Lord Captain! All that remains is for us to get out of this infernal place — alive — return to our vessel, and... and then my answer to your question will be, 'Magnificent!'"

traits.locale_text: "Sağlığım yerinde çok şükür Lord Kaptan! Bir de bu iğrenç yerden sağ salim çıkıp gemimize dönebilirsek sorunuza vereceğim cevap, 'Fevkalade!' olacaktır!"
